name: Psychonauts Vault Viewer!
description:
COMPATIBILITY NOTICE: This app will not be available on any device with iOS 11 or higher. It will still work on devices with iOS 10 or lower.

The Psychonauts Vault Viewer takes all of the Memory Vaults from the classic game Psychonauts and puts them right here in your hand! For free! You can peruse the deepest, most secret thoughts of the game’s characters, while listening to newly-recorded commentary from Scott Campbell and Tim Schafer.

This free app was created to celebrate the long-awaited release of The Excellent Game Psychonauts for the Mac.

Warning: Using this app may cause a sudden, uncontrollable rush of enthusiasm for Psychonauts, which could cause you to rush out and buy the game from the Mac App Store. Well, that’s the plan anyway. Tell us if it works!
